dialogs.text: Hey! Watch it!  You almost stepped on me!

choices.text: I thought I just heard someone say 'You almost stepped on me' ???

dialogs.text: <size=80%>Yes I can.  I've been living on this campus for years.  Watching students like you go to and from those fake trees... uhm... oh yeah, BUILDINGS.  So I started doing the same.  Hiding in the corners.  Under desks.  On the ceiling.  And I learned A LOT!  How to speak English.  Math.  Science.  But my favorite subject was sociology, especially in the area of human interaction.  I've become quite an expert in the field.  I mean, I'm an expert even when I'm not in the field... I mean, well you get what I mean.

choices.text: That's my least favorite subject. I don't understand human interaction at all.</size>

dialogs.text: Slime-ation?  I'm a mollusk.  My mucus protects me.  Officially, I'm a banana slug.

<size=80%>Really?
Hey, I have an idea. I've been craving a red polka-dotted mushroom, but it takes me months to traverse this campus on my foot. You seem to be much more efficient with two. How about you let me hitch a ride, and I'll help you with the social interaction stuff?

choices.text: Hitch a ride? That's awful, I don't want your slime all over me!
I guess I need to bring you to my friend over there anyways.</size>

dialogs.text: Cool. And if we find a red polka-dotted mushroom on our travels, I'll give you a kiss!

choices.text: Yuck. Not necessary. But I'll think of something you can do for me

dialogs.text: If you change your mind, I won't have gotten very far.
Cool. Just bend down a little, and I'll slide right on...
